data.text: Na afei, sei na Awurade seɛ,
Sɛ wofa nsuo mu a,
Na mene Awurade, wo Onyankopɔn,
Sɛ wo som bo ma me na wowɔ animuonyam wɔ mʼanim
Nsuro, ɛfiri sɛ, meka mo ho;
Mɛka akyerɛ atifi fam sɛ, ‘Monnyaa wɔn!’
obiara a me din da no so,
Momfa wɔn a wɔwɔ ani, nanso wɔnhunu adeɛ
Aman no nyinaa boa wɔn ho ano
“Mone mʼadansefoɔ, ne me ɔsomfoɔ a mapa no,”
Me, Me ara, Mene Awurade,
Mada no adi na magye nkwa na mapae mu aka sɛ,
Aane, na ɛfiri teteete no mene no.
Sei na Awurade seɛ,
Mene Awurade, wo Kronkronni no,
Yei na Awurade seɛ,
deɛ ɔtwee nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ,
“Momma mo werɛ mfiri kane nneɛma no
Hwɛ, mereyɛ adeɛ foforɔ!
Mmoa a wɔyɛ keka hyɛ me animuonyam,
nnipa a meyɛɛ wɔn maa me ho
“Nanso, womfrɛɛ me, Ao Yakob,
Momfaa nnwan mmrɛɛ me sɛ ɔhyeɛ afɔrebɔdeɛ,
Montɔɔ nnuhwam mmrɛɛ me,
“Me, me ara, mene deɛ ɔpepa
Monhwehwɛ deɛ atwam no mu bio mma me,
Mo agya a ɔdii ɛkan no yɛɛ bɔne;
Enti magu mo asɔredan mu atitire anim ase,
